wikipedia_page.main:
Richard John Charles Hersee ((1867-11-25)25 November 1867 – 5 May 1922) was a Welsh international footballer. He was part of the Wales national football team, playing 1 match and scoring 1 goal on 27 February 1886 against Ireland. At club level, he played for Llandudno Swifts.
He was the younger brother of Malcolm Hersee.

response: *Richard Hersee (1867–1922), Llandudno Swifts F.C. and Wales international footballer
